explanation: [0-0] On a dark train, illuminated by blue light, numerous shadowy figures appear, with a hat-wearing figure on the right side of the frame.
[0-3] The blue light above flickers, and a lamp suddenly lights up, revealing a golden bear, its body twisting.
[0-3] The blue light above flickers, and a lamp suddenly lights up, revealing a golden bear, its body twisting.
[0-3] The blue light above flickers, and a lamp suddenly lights up, revealing a golden bear, its body twisting.

[3-10] The scene cuts to the front of the bear, its face emitting light, with blue light emanating from behind it. The scene then shifts behind the bear, where the train door reveals a crescent moon in the night sky. Subsequently, the luminous bear walks towards the edge of the train, opens the door, and looks down at the path below.

[10-17] The camera cuts to a close-up as the luminous bear jumps off the train, landing in a puddle with a splash, surrounded by purple light. The scene transitions to a background with rocks, water, and a circular floral window. The luminous bear emerges from the water, its body now enlarged, and stands on a rock.
